name: Entrepreneurs' Organization
overview:
Entrepreneurs’ Organization (EO) is a global non-profit group dedicated to inspiring entrepreneurs to learn and grow.

Formerly known as YEO (Young Entrepreneurs’ Organization), the group has 8,000 members spread across 38 countries.

Entrepreneurs’ Organization also operates the Global Student Entrepreneur Awards program, the premier award for undergraduate students that own and run businesses while attending a college or university, as well as the Accelerator Program, a series of quarterly, high-impact learning events that provide business owners with the tools, knowledge, and skills to grow their businesses to more than US$1 million in annual revenue.

The EO Vision: To build the world’s most influential community of entrepreneurs.

The EO Mission: Engage leading entrepreneurs to learn and grow.

The EO Core Values: Boldly Go! - Bet on your own abilities Thirst for Learning - Be a student of opportunity Make a Mark - Leave a legacy Trust and Respect - Build a safe haven for learning and growth Cool - Create, seek out and celebrate once-in-a-lifetime experiences
